headline: Dollar Tree (DLTR) Ditches Family Dollar – Jim Cramer Says ‘Mercifully Dumped an Ailing Business!’
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Highlighted 12 Stocks and Tariff Panic. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Dollar Tree, Inc. (NASDAQ:DLTR) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer highlighted. On Monday, Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, discussed the current market and he identified opportunities […]

headline: Trump Tariffs Wipe Out Nearly $2 Trillion From US Stock Market

headline: How Trump's tariffs are hitting the retail sector
summary: President Trump's tariffs will likely hit retail hard, as most retailers have large exposure to Asian markets. Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma joins the Morning Brief to take a look at how tariffs will impact Nike (NKE), Lululemon Athletica (LULU), and Dollar Tree (DLTR). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Walmart, Target, and Other Retail Stocks Sink as Investors Digest Trump Tariffs
summary: Walmart, Target, and other retail stocks sank Thursday after the Trump administration announced sweeping reciprocal tariffs against U.S. trading partners.
